name: Jordan 14 Retro Ferrari (2025)

details.description:
The Jordan 14 Retro Ferrari (2025) races back into the spotlight, dripping in sleek, performance-inspired design. Dressed in challenge red suede with black and vibrant yellow accents, this pair doesn’t whisper, it’s got that supercar growl. The build is aerodynamic bold, echoing the lines of a Ferrari with Jordan’s basketball legacy riding shotgun.

Carbon fiber detailing and that iconic chrome shank plate keep things aggressive, while the Jumpman shield on the collar adds a subtle nod to Italian speed. The suede upper hugs the shoe in one solid piece, giving it the same seamless precision you’d expect. Whether you’re stomping pavement or flexing in a fit pic, these deliver serious horsepower. The Jordan 14 Ferrari (2025) Dropped on June 11, 2025, and hit shelves at $215, dressed in challenge red, black, vibrant yellow, and anthracite. If you missed the original, this re-release gives you another chance to drive the heat.

name: Jordan 11 Retro Low Bred (2025)

details.description: The Jordan 11 Retro Low Bred (2025) is a highly anticipated release that pays homage to a legendary colorway. This low-top version features a sleek black mesh upper complemented by glossy patent leather mudguards, creating a striking contrast. The bold varsity red accents add a pop of color, while the white midsole and translucent red outsole complete the classic design. Inspired by the PE pair Michael Jordan wore during the 1996 season, this sneaker captures a significant moment in basketball history. The combination of premium materials and iconic color scheme makes this release the truest remake of the Bred colorway on the Jordan 11 Low to date. Whether you're a seasoned sneaker collector or a casual enthusiast, these kicks are designed to turn heads on and off the court. Our team thinks this product is great for those who appreciate timeless style and basketball heritage, offering a perfect blend of performance and street-ready aesthetics.

name: Jordan 11 Retro Legend Blue (2024)

details.description:
The Jordan 11 Retro Legend Blue (2024), also known as the Columbia 11s, is easily one of the most well known and beloved colorways of the Jordan 11 ever produced. Dating back to 1996, this sneaker has only retro'd twice since then, with the latest version being 10 years ago in 2014.

The Legend Blue 11s feature an all white upper with white laces and an icy blue sole. The Jumpman logo pops in a Legend Blue accent as the finishing touch on this clean colorway. Jordan was famously spotted wearing these for the first time in the 1996 All-Star game, donning the now-iconic teal blue jerseys as the East defeated the West in San Antonio by a score of 129 to 118, in which Jordan was the game's MVP.

The Jordan 11 Retro Legend Blue (2024) released on December 14th, 2024, for a retail price of $230. Our experts love this sneaker due to its storied history and infrequent retro releases, making this sneaker likely to be ever-more collectible as the years go on.

name: Jordan 1 Retro High OG UNC Reimagined

details.description:
The Jordan 1 Retro High OG UNC Reimagined brings classic energy back with a twist that feels straight out of the vault. Inspired by the University of North Carolina’s iconic blue and white palette, this version adds a nostalgic spin by incorporating cracked leather overlays and an aged midsole finish. It’s a nod to the past while still moving things forward—balancing vintage appeal with modern-day edge.

What really elevates this pair is the packaging. The box alone tells a story: distressed orange on the bottom, black and red on the lid, mimicking the mismatched look of something unearthed in a forgotten storage room. It's a subtle flip on 2022's "Lost and Found" release that collectors will appreciate. Every detail from the sail-colored midsole to the powder blue overlays adds to the worn-in, loved feel—like it’s been waiting decades to be laced up again.

The Jordan 1 Retro High OG UNC Reimagined released on May 10, 2025, for a retail price of $180. The colorway blends dark powder blue and sail, keeping the UNC spirit alive with just the right amount of wear and tear built in.

name: Jordan 1 Retro Low OG SP Travis Scott Velvet Brown

details.description:
The Air Jordan 1 Retro Low OG SP Travis Scott Velvet Brown is a fresh collaboration that effortlessly merges the boldness of Travis Scott’s aesthetic with the timeless allure of the Jordan 1 silhouette. Featuring a dark mocha, black, and velvet brown colorway, this sneaker embraces an earthy palette that feels both rugged and luxurious. Signature Cactus Jack branding and reverse Swoosh designs elevate the sneaker’s uniqueness, making it a must-have for collectors and fans.

Beyond aesthetics, this iteration stays true to the Air Jordan 1’s roots. The premium materials and meticulous detailing—hallmarks of Travis Scott’s collaborations—promise an experience that’s as stylish as it is functional. Whether you're pairing it with streetwear or using it to anchor a statement outfit, this design delivers unparalleled versatility.

Released on December 21, 2024, for $150, the Air Jordan 1 Retro Low OG SP Travis Scott Velvet Brown captures the perfect mix of classic and contemporary. With its earthy brown tones, this sneaker stands out as a testament to the ever-evolving art of sneaker design.

name: Jordan 1 Retro High OG Shattered Backboard (2025)
Jordan 1 Retro Low OG SP Travis Scott Medium Olive

details.description:
The Jordan 1 Retro Low OG SP Travis Scott Medium Olive continues the highly coveted collaboration between Jordan Brand and Travis Scott, offering sneakerheads a fresh take on a classic silhouette. Dressed in a striking colorway of medium olive, black, sail, and muslin, this low-top design is instantly recognizable with its iconic reverse swoosh, a signature element of the Travis Scott x Jordan partnership. The premium leather and suede construction provides a tactile contrast, while the standout red Jordan wings logo on the heel and the Cactus Jack branding on the medial side elevate the sneaker’s distinctive style.

Travis Scott’s collaboration with Jordan has had an undeniable influence on sneaker culture, making each new release a must-have for collectors. The reverse swoosh, initially introduced with the first collaboration, has become synonymous with the Travis Scott brand, and this Jordan 1 Low model amplifies that signature aesthetic. Alongside the bold swoosh, other details like the sail midsole, muslin accents, and custom Travis Scott logos give the sneaker a blend of vintage appeal and modern streetwear edge, making it a versatile option for any look.

Released on September 28, 2024, the Jordan 1 Retro Low OG SP Travis Scott Medium Olive retailed at $150. This medium olive, black, sail, and muslin colorway continues to build on the legacy of the Jordan x Travis Scott collaboration, offering a sneaker that is a key piece of today’s sneaker fashion. Whether you're a dedicated Jordan collector or a fan of streetwear culture, this release is sure to make a statement.

name: Jordan 1 Retro High OG SP Union LA Chicago Shadow

details.description:
The Jordan 1 Retro High OG SP Union LA Chicago Shadow brings two legendary colorways together in a seamless blend of heritage and innovation. Union LA continues its signature design approach, merging the iconic Chicago red-and-white leather base with the Shadow grey and black ankle collar, creating a striking contrast. The transition between the two sections is accentuated by exposed University Blue stitching, a nod to the craftsmanship behind this unique fusion.

Vintage details elevate the design, with an "aged" sail midsole, a paper-like tongue tag, and exposed foam tongue seams, all adding to the sneaker’s retro aesthetic. The yellow Union LA tag on the collar remains a signature touch, reinforcing the brand’s signature deconstructed-meets-luxury approach. Complementing the premium leather construction, mix-and-match lacing options provide added versatility, allowing wearers to put their own spin on the silhouette.

The Jordan 1 Retro High OG SP Union LA Chicago Shadow was released on February 27, 2025, for a retail price of $200. With its masterful combination of two timeless Air Jordan 1 colorways, this collaboration stands as another must-have addition to Union LA’s growing legacy.

name: Jordan 12 Retro Flu Game (2025)

details.description:
The Jordan 12 Retro Flu Game (2025) marks the return of one of the most legendary sneakers in basketball history. First introduced in 1997 and last seen in 2016, this colorway represents an unforgettable moment in Michael Jordan’s career. During Game 5 of the 1997 NBA Finals, MJ battled flu-like symptoms and still delivered a clutch 38-point performance, securing a vital win for the Chicago Bulls. This sneaker, draped in black and varsity red, became a symbol of perseverance, making it one of the most iconic Air Jordans ever released

Staying true to its roots, the 2025 edition features premium black tumbled leather on the upper, exuding a sleek and timeless look. The textured varsity red mudguard and midsole bring bold contrast, while signature details like the Jumpman logo on the tongue and heel tab complete the classic aesthetic. Whether you're a longtime collector or new to the game, the Flu Game 12s remain an essential piece of sneaker history.

The Jordan 12 Retro Flu Game (2025) released on March 1, 2025, for a retail price of $210. With its deep-rooted connection to one of basketball’s most legendary performances, this release continues to captivate sneakerheads and MJ fans alike.

name: Jordan 1 Retro High OG Black Toe Reimagined

details.description:
The Jordan 1 Retro High OG Black Toe Reimagined is a fresh take on one of the most iconic Air Jordan 1 colorways. The black, varsity red, and white combination is a nod to the original 1985 release that helped define sneaker culture. However, this reimagined version includes several special updates, adding a modern twist to a classic look. One of the standout features is the "Air Jordan" text replacing the traditional wings logo on the collar, offering a subtle but significant change.

Another striking detail is the black tongue, which contrasts against the red and white panels, along with a slightly aged-looking midsole, giving the sneaker a vintage vibe while maintaining its timeless appeal. Michael Jordan’s signature and a heartfelt message make this pair truly one of a kind. Add in a unique box featuring an image from the original Air Jordan 1 marketing campaigns, and this release is a true collector’s item.

Released in 2025, the Jordan 1 Retro High OG Black Toe Reimagined retailed for $180. With its blend of nostalgic elements and updates based on the original Air Jordan 1 High that was never released to the public, this highly anticipated release is a must-have for both longtime Jordan fans and new collectors alike.

name: Jordan 12 Retro Melo (2025)

details.description:
The Jordan 12 Retro Melo (2025) revives a cherished chapter in Jordan Brand history, paying tribute to Carmelo Anthony’s legendary rookie season. Originally released in 2004 and inspired by Melo’s Denver Nuggets PE, the silhouette makes a full-fledged comeback this summer in a faithful recreation. The sneaker is draped in clean white leather with hits of university blue on the lining, outsole, and heel tab, plus touches of metallic silver on the eyelets that elevate its nostalgic edge.

The 2025 version is all about authenticity, returning in true-to-original form rather than leaning into alternate takes or exclusive sizing. Jordan Brand has tapped into its early 2000s vault for this retro, offering longtime collectors and new fans a chance to experience one of Melo’s most iconic pairs. It’s a release that nods to the past while fitting seamlessly into the current wave of retro basketball heat.

The Jordan 12 Retro Melo (2025) released on May 17, 2025, for a retail price of $200. Featuring a white, university blue, and metallic silver colorway, this drop serves as a must-have moment for sneakerheads chasing that OG Melo magic.

name: Jordan 14 Retro Ferrari (2025) (GS)
Jordan 1 Retro Low OG SP Travis Scott Canary (Women's)

details.description:
Immerse yourself in the stylish and bold world of the Jordan 1 Retro Low OG SP Travis Scott Canary (Women's), a sneaker that brings a fresh vibe to a classic silhouette. This edition is splashed in Canary, Racer Blue, and Light Silver hues, embodying the energy of Travis Scott's alma mater, Elkins High School. The sneaker’s design is highlighted by the iconic reversed Swoosh, a hallmark of Travis Scott’s transformative touch to the Jordan 1 & sneaker culture. Adorned with the Cactus Jack logo, these sneakers are a true testament to the rapper's influence and aesthetic.

The Jordan 1 Retro Low OG SP Travis Scott Canary is a piece of wearable art. Crafted with premium materials for comfort and durability, the design also features a gum medium brown outsole that complements the vibrant upper, ensuring these shoes stand out in any crowd. The combination of Travis Scott's unique style and Jordan Brand's legendary craftsmanship offers wearers a mix of street-worthy appeal and high-fashion sensibility.

Released on May 17, 2024, the Jordan 1 Retro Low OG SP Travis Scott Canary (Women's) was retailed for $150. Each pair reflects the spirit of innovation and youth, capturing the essence of Travis Scott's creative vision and the enduring legacy of the Jordan brand. With each step, wearers celebrate a legacy of musical prowess and sneaker history, making it a coveted addition to any collection.

name: Jordan 1 Retro High OG Black Metallic Gold

details.description:
The Jordan 1 Retro High OG Black Metallic Gold adds stark black and metallic-gold color blocking to this classic Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG variation.

Premium leather provides durable structure to the upper, while the solid rubber outsole adds traction underfoot. Although the base construction comes in black, metallic-gold accents decorate the perforated vamp, the Swoosh large logo, the heel, and the overlay across the ankle. The natural rubber tone of the outsole complements the metallic gold, while the midsole’s Sail hue gives the sneaker a retro feel. In keeping with tradition, the Air Jordan Wings logo is displayed across the metallic-gold leather.

Our experts like the gold "NIKE AIR" lettering on the tag because it stands out against the black tongue and contributes to the sneaker’s black-on-gold aesthetic. The Jordan 1 Retro High OG Black Metallic Gold was originally released on August 10, 2024, and was priced at $180.

name: Jordan 12 Retro Flu Game (2025) (GS)

details.description:
The Jordan 12 Retro Flu Game (2025) (GS) brings one of the most legendary sneakers in basketball history to a new generation. First introduced in 1997 and last seen in 2016, this colorway is tied to Michael Jordan's unforgettable Game 5 performance in the 1997 NBA Finals, where he overcame flu-like symptoms to drop 38 points and secure a crucial win for the Bulls. Now, kids can lace up a piece of basketball history with this downsized edition made just for them.

Staying true to the original design, this GS version features a premium black tumbled leather upper paired with a bold varsity red mudguard and midsole, offering the same sleek and powerful aesthetic. Classic Jumpman branding on the tongue and heel tab keeps the look authentic, while the lightweight cushioning and supportive fit make it perfect for all-day wear whether on the playground or the court.

Released on March 1, 2025, for a retail price of $150, the Jordan 12 Retro Flu Game (2025) (GS) gives kids the chance to rock one of the most historic sneakers in the Air Jordan lineup. With its deep-rooted legacy and bold color-blocking, this pair remains an essential pickup for young sneaker fans.

name: Jordan 11 Retro DMP Gratitude (2023)

details.description:
Please note, the shade of the outsole on the Jordan 11 Retro DMP Gratitude (2023) may slightly vary, due to the region in which the product was originally purchased from the manufacturer or retailer.

The Jordan 11 Retro DMP Gratitude (2023) is a nod to the illustrious heritage encapsulated in the Jordan brand. This iconic Jordan 11 model resurfaces with a touch of the famous Defining Moments colorway. This edition is a herald of the lauded "DMP" series, bringing back the nostalgia from 2006 when it was initially released with an Air Jordan 6, embodying a timeless treasure for the Jordan lineage​.

Delving into the aesthetics, the colorway is nothing short of iconic. The upper boasts a high-cut patent leather. The usual mesh is replaced with leather that not only elevates its look but its texture. The white midsole is balanced meticulously with a translucent rubber outsole, evoking a sleek, clean design that's synonymous with the Jordan brand's premium craftsmanship.

The Metallic Gold accents echo the legendary legacy of Jordan, adorning the embossed Jumpman logo on the lateral ankle and the iconic "23" on the heels. These distinctive embellishments reflect a heritage of victory and valor, encapsulated in a sneaker that's not just worn, but celebrated. The Jordan 11 Retro DMP Gratitude (2023) released on December 9, 2023, at a retail price of $230.

name: Jordan 1 Retro High OG Chicago Lost and Found

details.description: The original Air Jordan 1 Chicago colorway was first introduced in 1985 and has only been retroed a few times since. But 2022 is the year that the colorway returns with an added vintage look. Pre-yellowed accents and cracked leather uppers showcase a fabricated look of age and wear. The Air Jordan 1 Lost and Found Chicago released in November of 2022 for $180.

name: Jordan 1 Low OG Obsidian UNC

details.description:
The Jordan 1 Low OG Obsidian UNC brings back a color scheme inspired by Michael Jordan’s alma mater, the University of North Carolina. Featuring an all-leather upper, this low-top iteration mirrors the beloved AJ1 High "Obsidian" with obsidian overlays, a university blue heel, and a sail base for a clean yet bold contrast. The timeless silhouette is finished with Nike Air branding on the tongue and the iconic Wings logo on the heel, staying true to its heritage.

This release blends nostalgia with everyday wearability, offering a sleek and versatile look for both Jordan enthusiasts and casual sneaker fans. The premium leather construction ensures durability, while the off-white stitched midsole and dark blue outsole complete the aesthetic. Whether you’re lacing up for the streets or keeping them fresh for special occasions, this pair delivers classic Jordan DNA.

Released on March 29, 2025, for a retail price of $140, the Jordan 1 Low OG Obsidian UNC delivers an iconic colorway in a low-top form. With its perfect mix of heritage and style, this sneaker is a must-have for any collection.

name: Jordan 1 Retro High OG Black White

details.description:
The Jordan 1 Retro High OG Black White stands as a timeless pillar in sneaker culture, marrying the heritage of Michael Jordan's rookie silhouette with a sleek, monochromatic design. This sneaker speaks directly to those who appreciate the origins of sneaker culture while staying firmly rooted in the present. Its black and white colorway delivers a stark, yet sophisticated contrast that transcends fleeting trends, making it an enduring staple in any collection.

Crafted for the streets but born on the hardwood, the Jordan 1 Retro High OG Black White retains the classic elements that catapulted it to fame—premium materials, an Air-Sole unit for comfort, and the iconic Wings logo. This sneaker is not just a piece of history; it's a canvas for self-expression, appealing to the stylistic sensibilities of a new generation who values both legacy and modernity.

On February 24, 2024, the Jordan 1 Retro High OG Black White was released for $180, instantly becoming a cherished addition to the rotations of sneaker enthusiasts. Its clean and versatile aesthetic, combined with its storied past, cements its status as a lifestyle essential that pays homage to the past while stepping boldly into the future.

name: Jordan 1 Retro Low OG Mocha

details.description:
The Jordan 1 Retro Low OG Mocha is a low-top shoe whose design was inspired by the 80s basketball look.
  
The Mocha Jordan 1 Retro Low OG has an upper made of white leather. This material and color form the side panels and the toebox, which also has perforations for extra air flow. A black leather overlay serves as the toecap and mudguard and attaches the bottom eyelets to the midsole. Thin black Nike Swooshes also appear in black leather on each side. Suede in Dark Mocha forms the heel counter and heel collar, and the heel collar also features a black Air Jordan logo. The tongue also bears a Dark Mocha Nike Air patch. A white midsole and black outsole complete the look. 

The most interesting feature of this shoe are the way the black and Dark Mocha colors work together, adding a hint of subtle elegance. The Jordan 1 Retro Low OG Mocha was released on September 21, 2024, for $140.
